Talk1022:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm going to keep asking around and see
what else I can learn from the folks here.

Why don't you head up to that <clr:0000>three-way
intersection<clr:ffff> and take a look around?
Talk1063:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>We can meet right where you can see the
<clr:0000>fallen debris<clr:ffff>!
Talk1023:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Trouble>I couldn't get a read on her at all...
Except that she was definitely giving off
some strange vibes.
Talk1024:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>She came up to me when I was by the
debris near the <clr:0000>three-way intersection<clr:ffff> up
ahead and said, "You have to help <clr:0000>her<clr:ffff>!"
Then she said, "Her life is in danger!<sp:5:0:0>
It would only make it worse to reveal who
she is..."
Talk1025:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Think>I tried to follow her to help, but I just
couldn't keep up with her. <sp:5:1:0>I lost track
of her pretty quickly...
And here I thought I was in pretty good
shape too.
Talk1026:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_01>She told me that, so long as the one who
came to her aid was <clr:0000>a man with blond
hair<clr:ffff>, she was sure to be OK.
Oh no... I worry that time is short for
my <clr:0000>friend<clr:ffff>...
Talk1027:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh, it is the blond-haired man! I knew
that you would return to help...

<sp:3:0:2:0300>But we cannot remain here! My poor,
regal <clr:0000>friend<clr:ffff>...

I shall guide you to where <clr:0000>she<clr:ffff> is hiding.
Will you follow me?
Talk1050:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy_00>I am sorry that you had to travel so far
with everything so slippery from the rain...
Talk1028:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>We should go to where my friend is... But!<sp:5:0:0>
Be careful not to be seen. We do not want
to draw evil to her!
Talk1011:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_00><sp:0:2:2:5000>It must be him, then...<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:2:2:6400>


<sp:3:0:2:0801>Oh, I am so rude! You have my apologies!


Come now! My <clr:0000>friend<clr:ffff> is waiting ahead!
Talk1012:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>She is waiting nearby, around the
<clr:0000>debris on the opposite cliff<clr:ffff>.

I will go on ahead and let <clr:0000>her<clr:ffff> know that
you are coming!
Talk1054: <sp:3:0:2:0701>So tell me...<sp:5:0:0> What have you unearthed?
Talk1015:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I am sorry for all of that. It was important
for me to test you.

Blond hair, courage to overcome a
challenge. And then another challenge.
And then another!
Oh, and your disgusting, unwavering
commitment to do "good."

<sp:3:0:2:0701>You are Princess Zelda's chosen
bodyguard, the swordsman Link, correct?
Talk1057:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_00>So this is where your investigation took
you. Looks like you really got yourself out
on a limb there!
I've been scouting from the skies, trying
to get to the bottom of this story. I heard
that woman was luring people away...
I thought I heard her voice, so I swooped
on down. And, hey, here you are!
Talk1040:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Hello, partner! You here to investigate
the rumors too?
Talk1017:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You see, I was by the debris near the
<clr:0000>three-way intersection<clr:ffff> up ahead when a
<clr:0000>woman <clr:ffff>came up to me.
"Please! Please, you have to help <clr:0000>her<clr:ffff>!


"Her life is in danger! It would only make
it worse to reveal who she is...

"But please, you must save <clr:0000>her<clr:ffff>!"<sp:5:1:0>
That's what she said to me.
Talk1058:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>You've definitely got some skills, though,
if you can escape from the Yiga Clan.<sp:5:0:0>
I'm proud of you, partner.
Talk1041:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Hello, partner! You here to investigate
the rumors too?

I admire your spirit! Most folks would take
one look at this weather and call it a day,
but not you! You're the real deal!
Talk1018:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>The woman sounded really desperate, so
I decided to follow her.

But no matter how hard I tried, I couldn't
keep up.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>Eventually I lost track of her. <sp:5:0:0>That's all
there is to it.
Talk1059: <sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting_00>It's no use, Link! I won't let you escape!
Talk1042:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Hello, partner! You here to investigate
the rumors too?

I admire your spirit! Most folks wouldn't
let a story keep them up so late, but not
you! You're the real deal!
Talk1001:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I've been hearing some interesting chirps
and warbles...
Talk1019:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>I see... <sp:5:0:0>Who could have guessed that this
whole story would be an elaborate trap
set by the <clr:0000>Yiga Clan<clr:ffff>...
If you didn't know, they're a group of
assassins trying to bring down the
kingdom of Hyrule.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>I heard they were good at disguising
themselves,<sp:5:0:0> but playing the part of a
villager? I never would have guessed.
And all to flush out the swordsman who
protects the princess...
Talk1043:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Hello, partner! You here to investigate
the rumors too?

I admire your spirit! Most folks would
leave a story until a bit later in the day,
but not you! You're the real deal!
Talk1002:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Oh, you're also a reporter?


I just had a bit of a strange experience
is all.
Talk1003:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hey, partner...


Does something strike you as odd about
this person whose identity can't
be revealed?
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>And if revealing who she is to strangers
is dangerous... Could she be someone of
great importance?
And if her life is already in danger...


Well, combining these facts makes me
wonder if this isn't actually a particular,
important person who has gone missing.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I can't be sure, of course, but if there's a
slight chance...

There's only one way for us to know for
sure though. We'll have to peck away at
this news and see what the truth is!
Talk1044:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I have a hunch that the <clr:0000>person<clr:ffff> that
woman was referring to and the <clr:0000>person<clr:ffff>
we're looking for are the same.
I can't be sure, of course, but if there's a
slight chance, well...

<sp:3:0:2:0701>On my honor as a reporter, I swear we
will peck away at this and see what the
truth is!
Talk1045:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>Thanks for lending your ear at such a
late hour!
Talk1004:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:QuestionNormal><sp:0:2:2:5000>...Now that I'm thinking about the whole thing again,
why was that woman staring so hard at my hair?<sp:5:0:0>
How strange.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk1046:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>Thanks for lending your ear at such an
early hour!
Talk1005:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Scare>Oooh nooo... <sp:5:0:0>My poor friend... <sp:5:0:0>Please,
you must save her...
Talk1047:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>Thanks for lending your ear, even in
weather like this!
Talk1006:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>Oh, thank you so much!


My friend is in hiding right now. That is
the only way for her to remain undetected
by those with ill intent!
Talk1007:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>My apologies for leaving you behind. I was
overtaken by my concern for my <clr:0000>friend<clr:ffff>...

<sp:3:0:2:0701><clr:0000>She<clr:ffff> is resting safely out of sight. It is
the only way to stay safe.

I am sorry that the path is so poor...
Talk1032:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Anyway, it's time I took off and turned
these unusual details into an article.<sp:5:1:0>
You take care, partner!
Talk1034:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Could you possibly go to the <clr:0000>top of
that cliff<clr:ffff>?
Talk1035:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_00>Hehehe, I am so glad to finally meet you.
Now I can take you to the last stop in our
little journey.
Talk1037:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:TalkPositive_01><sp:0:2:2:5000>B...<sp:5:1:0> B...<sp:5:0:0> Blond hair...<sp:5:1:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad_00><sp:0:2:2:6400>I do not know who you are, but I ask that
you please help me!

My poor, regal friend's life is in danger!
I cannot reveal who she is, for that would
only make things worse...
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>She's in hiding and unable to move.
My <clr:0000>friend<clr:ffff> is in such danger...

Please! I cannot help her all by myself!
Talk1060:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>What's that?<sp:5:1:0> The woman who was asking
for help was actually a member of the
Yiga Clan?
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>So she disguised herself as a villager
and was trying to lure the princess's
appointed knight to a trap...
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy>It really is some impressively bad luck
that they keep coming after you instead,
isn't it?
Talk1038:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Scare>Oh no... I worry that time is short for
my <clr:0000>friend<clr:ffff>...
Talk1061:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Tired_00>I'll...<sp:5:1:0> I'll let you off this time.


<sp:3:0:2:0901>But don't expect such mercy next time.<sp:5:0:0>
Prepare yourself!
Talk1020:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy>They thought you, a young up-and-
coming reporter who just happens
to have blond hair...
They believed you were actually that
swordsman? <sp:5:1:0>That's just bad luck for you!
Talk1062:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I will wait for you <clr:0000>down this road<clr:ffff>. Meet me
as soon as you can!
Talk1039:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>It is a bit far off, but I know you will be
able to make it!
Talk1021:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>I'm glad I don't have to write a headline
like, "Junior Reporter Falls to the Cruel
Blade of the Yiga in Pursuit of Truth!"
